text: Algimantas Briaunys (born 3 November 1964) is a Lithuanian professional footballer/goalkeeper coach. He played the position of goalkeeper. He won a total of 4 international caps for the Lithuania national football team. ==Coaching career== From 2003 to 2004, Briaunys was manager of FK Atlantas.Algimantas Briaunys (g. 1964 m.) - LFE, lfe.lt In 2005, he then worked as goalkeeper coach for FC Flora and later from 2006 to 2008 for FCI Levadia Tallinn. In 2009, Briaunys was appointed manager of Banga Gargždai."Banga“ lieka I lygoje, gargzdai.lt, 21 February 2009 He left in 2010 and became assistant manager of FCI Levadia Tallinn in 2011 and later also goalkeeper coach at the club. At the end of 2011, Briaunys was hired as goalkeeper coach of JK Sillamäe Kalev and in September 2012, he was appointed manager of the club.Sillamäe Kalevi peatreeneriks sai Algimantas Briaunys, pohjarannik.postimees.ee, 13 September 2012 He left the manager post in April 2013 and continued as goalkeeper coach of the club. In July 2019, he joined Palanga as assistant manager and in September 2019, he became manager for the rest of the season after the departure of Viačeslavu Geraščenka.A lygos autsaiderė "Palanga“ pakeitė trenerį, 15min.lt, 17 September 2019 ==Honours== ;Flora *Meistriliiga champion: 1993–94, 1994–95 *Meistriliiga runner-up: 1995–96 *Estonian Cup winner: 1994–95 ;Žalgiris *A Lyga runner-up: 1996–97, 1997–98 *Lithuanian Football Cup winner: 1997 ;Liepājas Metalurgs *Latvian Higher League runner-up: 1998, 1999 *Latvian Higher League bronze: 2000, 2001 ;Atlantas *A Lyga runner-up: 2002 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1964 births Category:People from Sovetsk, Kaliningrad Oblast Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FK Atlantas players Category:FK Sirijus Klaipėda players Category:Lithuanian footballers Category:FC Asmaral Moscow players Category:Lithuanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Halychyna Drohobych players Category:Expatriate footballers in Ukraine Category:FC Flora players Category:Expatriate footballers in Estonia Category:Lithuanian expatriate sportspeople in Estonia Category:F.C. title: Algimantas Briaunys
